Sentra Batik Kota Tasikmalaya, Jadi Kampung Batik Bright Gas
01 Nov 2019, 18:25 by Nova Nugraha Putra



Sentra Batik Kota Tasikmalaya, Jadi Kampung Batik Bright Gas



Sentra Batik Kota Tasikmalaya, Jadi Kampung Batik Bright Gas


KBRN, Tasikmalaya : PT. Pertamina MOR III dan Pemerintah Kota Tasikmalaya, Jawa Barat, meresmikan sentra Batik Kota Tasikmalaya di Jalan Ciroyom Kampung Cigeureung, Kelurahan Nagarasari, Kecamatan Cipedes, menjadi kampung batik bright gas, Jumat (1/11/2019).General Manager PT. Pertamina MOR III, Tengku Fernanda mengatakan, pembentukan kampung bright gas, merupakan apresiasi terhadap para pelaku industri batik yang ada di kampung ini."Disini sudah tidak ada lagi yang menggunakan subsidi 3 kg," kata Tengku kepada Radio Republik Indonesia RRI, Jumat (1/11/2019).Sentra batik Cigereung lanjut Tengku, sudah sukses melakukan konversi gas subsidi ke non subsidi."Aturannya, pelaku industri ini atau UMKM memang tidak berhak atas gas 3 kg," katanya.Untuk mempermudah penukaran tabung 3 kg ke bright gas, di kampung itu Pertamina, juga membuka pangkalan bright gas."Tidak hanya pengusaha yang sudah menggunakan bright gas, kami juga mengajak pengusaha batik lainnya menggunakan bright gas," ucapnya.Dengan ke khasan yang ada, Kampung Cigereung juga diharapkan menjadi salah satu ikon Kota Tasikmalaya. Untuk itu, Pertamina juga membuat peta panduan kampung batik yang akam mempermudah wisatawan."Ini untuk mempermudah wisatawan yang datang. Kami juga membuka peluang bagi pebatik lainnya untuk menjadi mitra binaan," tambahnya.Sementara itu Wali Kota Tasikmalaya Budi Budiman menjelaskan, pemerintah berkomitmen untuk bersama- sama mensosialisasikan konversi gas 3 kg ke bright gas."Ini juga merupakan langkah membangun kesadaran para pelaku UMKM untuk tidak memakai gas bersubsidi," imbuhnya.Budi berharap kedepan, apa yang dilakukan di kampung batik, dapat diikuti oleh pelaku industri lainnya."Mudah- mudah tidak hanya disini, tapi semua pelaku industri yang memang tidak berhak atas gas subsidi," pungkasnya.

Tasikmalaya City Batik Centers, Become Bright Gas Batik Village
Nov 01 2019, 18:25 by Nova Nugraha Putra



Tasikmalaya City Batik Centers, Become Bright Gas Batik Village



Tasikmalaya City Batik Centers, Become Bright Gas Batik Village


KBRN, Tasikmalaya: PT. Pertamina MOR III and the City Government of Tasikmalaya, West Java, inaugurated the Batik center of Tasikmalaya City on Ciroyom Street, Cigeureung Village, Nagarasari Village, Cipedes District, becoming a bright gas batik village, Friday (11/01/2019). General Manager of PT. Pertamina MOR III, Tengku Fernanda, said the formation of the bright gas village was an appreciation of the batik industry players in this village. "Here no longer uses 3 kg of subsidies," Tengku told RRI Radio Republik Indonesia, Friday (1 / 11/2019).Sentra batik center Cigereung continued Tengku, has succeeded in converting subsidized gas to non-subsidized. "The rule is that the industry or MSMEs are not entitled to 3 kg of gas," he said. To facilitate the exchange of 3 kg cylinders to bright gas , in that village, Pertamina, also opened a bright gas base. "Not only entrepreneurs who have used bright gas, we also invite other batik entrepreneurs to use bright gas," he said. With the special idea, Kampung Cigereung is also expected to become one of the icons of the City Tasikmalaya. For this reason, Pertamina also made a map of batik village guides that will make it easier for tourists. "This is to facilitate tourists who come. We also open up opportunities for other candidates to become fostered partners," he added. Meanwhile, Mayor of Tasikmalaya Budi Budiman explained, the government is committed to together socializing the conversion of 3 kg gas to bright gas. "This is also a step to build awareness among MSME entrepreneurs not to use subsidized gas," he added. Budi hopes that in the future, what is done in the batik village can be followed by other industry players. " "It's easy not only here, but all industry players who are not entitled to subsidized gas," he concluded.
